code: if (interactive()) {   # Convert roxygen to Markdown in one run   roxygen2md() }  # Alternatively, convert in three steps: if (interactive()) {   # 1. Enable Markdown processing   roxygen2md("none")    menu("Please examine/commit the changes and press 1 <enter> to continue.")    # 2. Convert simple markup   roxygen2md("simple")    menu("Please examine/commit the changes and press 1 <enter> to continue.")    # 3. (Optionally) Remove some of the \code{} expressions   roxygen2md("unlink")    menu(paste0(     "Please remove all unwanted changes, commit the wanted ones, ",     "and press 1 <enter> to continue."   ))    # 4. Convert everything, including links   roxygen2md("full") }
